all:
Showing all commands for Project Senko
```Basic Commands```
`botinfo` Displays info about the bot.
`serverinfo` Displays info about the current server.
`help` Displays this text
`docs` Links to the bot's website.
`helloworld` Hello world!
```Moderation Commands```
`kick {user} {reason}` Kicks a user from the server.
`ban {user} {reason}` Bans a user from the server
`purge {amount}` Purges a specified amount of messages. (Max 100)
`tempmute {user} {duration}` Temporarily mutes a person from the server.(First time using this will automatically create a mute role. Set it up yourself.)
```Utility Commands```
`eval {JS Code}` Evaluates Code **ONLY LIMITED TO DEVS**
